## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8bf2d646cdb12e980ce27affd46673f51c006e612aa022a0d664adc4e1866de5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'worldpay-raft-connect' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
